context.p: Customers can explicitly start and stop the virtual machines created for a specific subscription in Azure from . To do this, they execute the appropriate service operation at the subscription:

ul.li: Start: Starts all virtual machines created for the subscription if they were stopped.
Stop: Stops all virtual machines created for the subscription if they were started.

context.p: As a prerequisite, the service operations must be defined in the technical service underlying the subscription.
Customers can view the status of all operations they started in their account information on the marketplace.
